title: Chat restricted for calling my garbage support garbage.
body: Now i can only call garbage supports garbage 5 times before we surrender.

replies.body: if this was in normals... shame on you, if this was in ranked you should be providing constructive criticism so they impove.

Also btw calling your support rubbish doesn't make them play better, they were good enough to be the same rank as you. The way you talk makes you sound like you are low elo, which probably means the supports don't main support, so they should be worse. Also, if they mess up and then you tell them how rubbish they are, they will probably tilt and continue to be rubbish. However, if you encourage them they might actually be decent, but have played poorly early. Riot restrict people on the basis that they think people will use the small chat they have to work together with their team, but since this is your response to someone, I guess you aren't going to change, so i'm not even sure why I made the effort to type this much
This is why you are chat restricted. Because even riot is sick of yo shit.
dnt tell me how play u bad adc im afkin so sik of toxc trolz lik u
If you call your support garbage that frequently that you get a chat restriction, maybe you are the one who is garbage.
Use another more appropriate word, its alright to criticize someone as long as you're not being a douche about it.

Calling others rubbish won't make them play better, it only makes you a duck head.

Criticism, cool. Shame and flame? Hell no.

Theirs no helping people on this server, if you don't have a Sightstone on your first back, then you're garbage.

P.S: garbage is far from an insult.

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7Ik0AgXp,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-14T13:32:26.798+0000)
>
> Theirs no helping people on this server, if you don't have a Sightstone on your first back, then you're garbage.
> 
> P.S: garbage is far from an insult.

Did the support dude also put a forced arbitrary expectation on you saying that you Must meet it otherwise he would call you a piece of trash while maybe treating you like one too? 

I know competition can sometimes drive people frustrated, especially under the condition that you're working with complete strangers, but calling another individual garbage inside a game is maybe going a little bit too far.

It really doesn't hurt to treat each other with decency, nor is it asking too much for wanting to be seen as an equal.

Remember, harsh words with no content behind only increases the chances of him performing worse and you get madder. You could have easily critised the guy's performance with just a slightly better use of wording and the dude wouldn't even mind if you're mad at him since you have kept enough of your cool and pointed out ways to let him improve.

That way, you happy, he happy. Win win, cool.
